issue.title: [CF 275] Rune cooldown icon type
issue.body:
Mistay said
Friday, August 12, 2011 11:00:32 PM (16 hours ago)

I really like the frames of TellMeWhen, and my current setup doesn't show my runes unless I use MagicRunes, and I don't really like the layout of it. Is it possible to make a TellMeWhen bar specifically to show my runes coming on and off cooldown, and during the cooldown, just like on default UI?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #275 | Raw
